metadata.description: Personal Claude Code marketplace with self-authored and curated plugins

plugins.name: shadcn-ui

plugins.name: skill-creator

plugins.name: cc-whats-new
plugins.description: Explain what's new in Claude Code versions with practical examples

plugins.description: Show the state of Marketplaces and Plugins across all scopes
